Name: ROM Repair - Reversi
Description: A portion of the ROM is broken and needs to be rewritten. We just don't know how to do it.
StartingComments:
This was a portion of the ROM that took 5 inputs from the TOP pipe and wrote them in reverse order. Given that there are only 4 registers, we're not sure how that was done.

Whatever solution you come up with, implement it as an infinite loop that read numbers 5-at-a-time, reverses them.
